articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00 on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Day), the national greatest auspicious holiday to pay high tribute to him.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with the senior officials of the Party Central Committee paid high tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 He entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He paid deep homage and made bow to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Thae Jong Su, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Pak Thae Song, Kim Yong Chol, Choe Hwi and Pak Thae Dok, vice-chairmen of the C.C., the WPK, and other senior officials of the Party Central Committee.

articles.title: Government Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Government Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Officials of the DPRK government visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Friday to pay homage to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.
					 Among them were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, and others and the chairman of a friendly party and officials of the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Seen before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the palace was a floral basket bearing the august name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also there was a floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the WPK Central Military Commission and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 A floral basket in the joint name of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK was placed before the statues.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 At the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state, they made deep bow to him.
					
					 The visitors went round the hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls that house a car, an electric car, boat and train coach used by him during his field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Also visiting the palace were servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and civilians from all walks of life.

articles.title: Press Statement of DPRK Permanent Mission to UN
articles.content:
Press Statement of DPRK Permanent Mission to UN
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Permanent Mission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) to the United Nations issued a press statement on February 12 as regards the fact that one year has passed since the DPRK Government requested the UN Secretariat to organize an international forum of legal experts for clarification of legality of the "sanctions resolutions" of the UN Security Council imposed against the DPRK.
					 Recalling that in January last year the DPRK proposed the UN Secretariat to organize an international forum of legal experts for clarification of legality of the "sanctions resolutions", the press statement said: 
					
					 The Permanent Mission of the DPRK to the United Nations, during past one year, has constantly requested for earliest organization of the international forum of legal experts to the UN Secretariat through the meetings with the secretary-general, the under-secretary-general for Political Affairs and the under-secretary-general for Legal Affairs, and the letters of the DPRK permanent representative addressed to the secretary-general for 5 times, releases of the Permanent Mission's press statements for 4 times as well as press conferences and interviews for 5 times.
					
					 However, the UN Secretariat still turns away our just proposal  for organizing an international forum of legal experts, continuously persisting in its outdated sophistry, saying that pursuant to Article 39 of the UN Charter, it is for the Security Council to determine whether or not a particular action or set of actions or a particular situation or dispute constitutes a threat to the peace, breach of the peace, or act of aggression and thus it is for the Security Council to decide what recommendations to make or what measures are to be taken to maintain or restore international peace and security.
					
					 The UN Secretariat should listen carefully to the voices raised from numerous legal experts and lawyers of many countries, who are supporting our proposal for international forum, insisting that the Security Council has no legal ground or moral justification to condemn nuclear test or launch of ICBM and satellite as violation of international law.
					
					 The DPRK Permanent Mission to the UN requests once again the UN Secretariat to immediately respond in a positive way to our proposal for organizing an international forum of legal experts, in conformity with the mission stipulated in the UN Charter.

articles.title: Letter of DPRK FM Distributed as U.N. Official Document
articles.content:
Letter of DPRK FM Distributed as U.N. Official Document
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A letter sent by the foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to the secretary-general of the United Nations as regards dangerous military moves against positive changes leading to the improvement of inter-Korean relations and detente booming on the Korean peninsula was distributed as an official document A/72/723-S/2018/81 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on Feb. 12.

articles.title: Greetings to Equatorial Guinean PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Equatorial Guinean PM
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, on Feb. 12 sent a congratulatory message to Francisco Pascual Obama Asue who stayed in office as prime minister of Equatorial Guinea.
					 Expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, the message wished him greater success in his work to achieve the social-economic development of the country.
					
					 On the same day, Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Simeon Oyono Esono Angue upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Equatorial Guinea.

articles.title: Congratulations to Nepalese PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Nepalese PM
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Friday sent a congratulatory message to K. P. Sharma Oli upon his appointment as prime minister of the government of Nepal.
					 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop in the common interests of the two peoples, the message wished him success in his responsible work for the country's political stability and economic development.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK-Russia Fishery Joint Committee Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK-Russia Fishery Joint Committee Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK-Russia Fishery Joint Committee headed by Vice-Minister of Fisheries Kim Chang Do left here Friday to attend the 30th meeting of the DPRK-Russia Joint Committee on cooperation in the fishery due in Russia.

articles.title: DPRK Celebrates Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
DPRK Celebrates Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK significantly marked the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On this occasion, many people visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state, and paid tribute to their smiling portraits there.
					
					 The statues of the great leaders and their smiling portraits on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang and in all other parts of the country were visited by servicepersons, civilians and school youth and children expressing profound reverence for them.
					
					 A constant stream of visitors flew to the venue of the 22nd Kimjongilia Festival in Pyongyang and venues of Kimjongilia exhibitions in provinces and photo exhibition venues.
					
					 Celebration performances were given at theatres in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Schoolchildren throughout the country joined the Korean Children's Union, vowing to prepare themselves to be the future masters and reliable pillars of socialist Korea under the care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Industrial establishments and farms across the country organized art performances representing the Korean people's high honor and pride of being the nation blessed with illustrious leaders and brilliant commanders down through generations as well as colorful sports and amusement games.
					
					 There were also national schoolchildren's folklore games such as kite-flying, shuttlecock game and rope-skipping at Kim Il Sung Square and other parts of Pyongyang.
					
					 Meanwhile, citizens in Pyongyang spent a good time at leisure complexes such as the Mangyongdae Amusement Park, Rungna Amusement Park and Munsu Water Park.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in the sky above Pyongyang on Friday evening in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Il Sung Square, Mansu Hill and Okryu Bridge centering on the bank of the Taedong River where the Tower of the Juche Idea stands and other places of the capital city were crowded with citizens from all walks of life and school youth and children eager to see the fireworks.
					
					 At 19:00, the display of celebration fireworks began amid the playing of song "We Present You Bouquet".
					
					 The loyal mind of all the army and people to glorify the greatest auspicious day of the nation, the revolutionary holiday when the heaven-sent great man was born, represented a beautiful scene in the February sky.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held 
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations took place in Pyongyang Friday in celebration of the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were delegates of the KCU from provinces and schoolchildren in Pyongyang and pupils joining the KCU.
					
					 Present on invitation were Vice-Chairman Choe Hwi of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Chairman Kim Sung Du of the Education Commission, officials of relevant fields and the youth league, war veterans and persons of merit.
					
					 Pak Chol Min, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, made a report.
					
					 The reporter recalled that Kim Jong Il had visited many schools and schoolchildren's palaces, though he was very busy providing the revolutionary leadership, and showed loving care so that the KCU members would grow up stoutly to be knowledgeable, moral and healthy.
					
					 He said that the history of loving care shown by the leader is being given a steady continuity on this land as there is respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called on the KCU members to grow up to be dependable pillars of socialist Korea true to the pledge they made before the flag of the KCU, with the pride of having become a member of the glorious Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Children's Union.
					
					 A ceremony for admission to the KCU was held at the meeting.
					
					 The pupils joining the KCU made an oath, led by Choe Hwi.
					
					 Officials, war veterans and persons of merit tied red neckties around their necks and attached KCU badges on their chests.
					
					 The pupils made the first greetings of the KCU member, responding to the slogan "Let us be always ready for socialist country". 
					
					 Then followed congratulatory speeches.

articles.title: Youth and Students Dance to Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Youth and Students Dance to Mark Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the DPRK on Friday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 They began in different parts of the capital city including the Monument to Party Founding and the plaza of the Arch of Triumph amid the playing of song "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem".
					
					 The participants expressed highest glory to Kim Jong Il, who provided a solid foundation for eternal prosperity of the nation and future of a socialist power with his unique idea and distinguished leadership, while dancing.
					
					 Youth and students danced to the tune of such songs as "Our General Is the Best", "The General Star beyond the Clouds" and "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", with profound reverence for the fatherly general who built a youth power without an equal on this land.
					
					 They enthusiastically danced, full of conviction that thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the great leaders' patriotic wishes for a powerful nation will surely come true, to the tunes of such songs as "Our Leader Loved by People" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un with Our Lives".
					
					 On the same day, similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Friday on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among them were representatives of foreign embassies and international organizations here, military attaches, a delegation of the Mongolian Juche idea study organization, a delegation of the Japanese Juche idea study society, a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star and a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					
					 The visitors paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to leader Kim Jong Il at the hall where he lies in state.
					
					 They went round a hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Great Leaders
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Great Leaders
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and civilians from all walks of life and school youth and children in the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il across the country on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang was a floral basket from Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid at the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions and units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions and enterprises at all levels, factories and schools in Pyongyang as well as bouquets.
					
					 Also placed was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Floral tribute was also paid to the statues at Kim Il Sung University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of the city.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and school youth and children in different parts of the country, too, visited the statues of the great leaders and their smiling portraits in their residential areas to pay deep respects to them.

articles.title: Delegations of Juche Idea Study Groups Visit 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Delegations of Juche Idea Study Groups Visit 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Venue
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the Mongolian Juche idea study organization and the Japanese Juche idea study society staying here to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il visited the 22nd Kimjongilia Festival venue on Friday.
					 They looked round the immortal flowers in full bloom by the reverence and utmost sincerity of the Korean army and people and the world progressives for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Earlier, they visited the Korean Revolution Museum and the Arch of Triumph.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Letter from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Letter from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said that the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was the noblest life of a peerless patriot who performed feats to shine long in history of the country by devoting his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of posterity to come.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the outstanding leader who brought up Chongryon to be the pioneer of the patriotic movement, an example of patriotism and loyalty and a model of overseas compatriots' movement true to the high intention of President Kim Il Sung, and the guardian of the destiny of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, the letter, noted.
					
					 It said that the history of loving care recorded with legendaries of the leadership, noble patriotism and compatriotism of Kim Jong Il is given a steady continuity thanks to the fatherly loving care and solicitude shown by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is bestowing everything on strengthening Chongryon and ensuring a happy life of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The letter stressed that the officials of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan would fulfill their patriotic mission and honorable duty before the country and the nation in the movement to make a breakthrough to the independent reunification in hearty response to the task for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in the New Year Address.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Letter from Central Committee of AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Letter from Central Committee of AINDF
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The letter said that Kim Jong Il's career is glorious as the sacred history in which he performed exploits for the country and nation and before the era and humankind.
					
					 It noted that he is being highly lauded as the father of the nation and eternal sun of humankind as he ushered in the June 15 era of reunification and provided the firm foundation for independent reunification and peace and prosperity by devoting his efforts and energy, and led the global cause of independence only to victory.
					
					 It noted that today Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, another heaven-sent great man, and the cause of the sun pioneered in Mt. Paektu is being dynamically advanced.
					
					 The present climate of national reconciliation, unity and reunification exciting the public at home and abroad is the grandiose picture brought about by the transparent idea of Kim Jong Un on independent reunification and rare guidance provided by him to put an end to the tragedy of division and reunify the country by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation, it pointed out.
					
					 The letter stressed that the vanguard fighters of the AINDF and patriotic people of various strata would hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of the nation for all ages and dedicate their all to the struggle for national reunification led by Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Great Scenery in Sobaeksu Valley
articles.content:
Great Scenery in Sobaeksu Valley
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The scenery of Jongil Peak towering high as if to escort the birthplace of leader Kim Jong Il in the Paektusan Secret Camp tops the eight grandeurs of the Sobaeksu Valley.
					 Its scenery is great in all seasons, but especially in winter it looks more magnificent and miraculous.
					
					 On the top of the peak, one can command a bird's-eye view of a spectacle that blizzard swirls a wavy sea of trees and runs up the ridge and cliffs of the peak.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA, Choe Ryon Hui, section chief of the Management Office for Revolutionary Battle Sites in the Secret Camp of Mt Paektu, said:
					
					 The scenery of Jongil Peak is unparalleled in the world as its grandiose and superb natural beauty harmonizes with the high aim and spirit of the heaven-sent great man of Paektu.
					
					 Our people carved on a cliff of the peak letters "Jongilbong" in November Juche 77 (1988) to manifest their faith and will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt Paektu generation after generation.
					
					 Since then, the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu have become evermore glorious as the powerful center for education in the revolutionary tradition and as the eternal treasure of the country.
					
					 Indeed, Jongil Peak is not only the witness to the revolutionary history of the three commanders of Mt Paektu but also the historic peak displaying all over the world the glory of the Korean nation with the birth of Kim Jong Il, the Shining Star of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Great Devotion Made on Blizzard-swept Road
articles.content:
Great Devotion Made on Blizzard-swept Road
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the DPRK people recollect with deep emotion the patriotic devotion made by him for the country's prosperity and people's happiness.
					 One early morning in January Juche 87 (1998), he arrived in Jagang Province to make an inspection tour of different units in the province despite of 30 degrees of frost.
					
					 The sky was dimming when he finished the inspection of a unit after giving field guidance to several units all day long.
					
					 Officials asked him to take a rest, but he went on his inspection to look around a minor hydraulic power station, saying that we should value time before sparing bones.
					
					 Having meals on the train, he gave field guidance to a number of units including the Pukchon Float Power Station, Janggang power stations No. 1 and 2, apartment buildings with electric heating in Janggang County and Jangjasan Power Station, covering hundreds kilometers that day.
					
					 Thanks to his patriotic devotion, a flame of fresh revolutionary upswing was kindled on this land and the whole country could wrap up the Arduous March, the forced march.

articles.title: Newspapers Praise Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Newspapers Praise Exploits of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of the DPRK Friday editorially praise the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on his 76th birth anniversary.
					 Noting that his history of revolutionary activities is just a history of victory and prosperity of the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The world knows many patriots and state leaders, but it has never seen such a peerlessly great man as Kim Jong Il who performed great exploits before the country and the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the peerlessly veteran statesman and iron-willed brilliant commander who turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power based on single-minded unity and a world-level military power.
					
					 He set the single-minded unity as the mainstay for the revolution and successfully realized the unity and cohesion of the party and the revolutionary ranks.
					
					 He is the genius of creation and construction as he laid a firm foundation for turning the DPRK into an economic power and a highly civilized nation in the 21st century.
					
					 The epoch-making rapid progress and changes made in the DPRK are a fruition of his boundless patriotic devotion, iron will and superhuman energy.
					
					 He smashed every desperate challenge of the U.S. imperialists and all other hostile forces and firmly protected the destiny of the country, nation and socialism and laid an ever-lasting foundation for the prosperity of Juche Korea. His revolutionary exploits will shine long generation after generation.
					
					 Minju Joson says the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il for socialism represent the inexhaustible strength of Juche Korea and guarantee for its sure victory and his exploits will remain long with prosperous Juche Korea.

articles.title: Abe Group Blasted for Anti-Chongryon Action
articles.content:
Abe Group Blasted for Anti-Chongryon Action
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Japanese police authorities arrested the former chairman of the Katsushiga chapter of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Jan. 31 on suspicion of the "violation of secondhand dealer law".
					 The next day, under the pretext that remittance to Chongryon was recorded in his bankbook, the police searched the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon and the house of its vice-chairman and concurrently director for publicity and culture and the office of the "Mirae Foundation" set up for supporting the Korean schools.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Friday says that such an anti-Chongryon campaign is aimed at creating an anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon climate in the Japanese society and destroying the dignified organization of overseas citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 The Abe group is also seeking conditions and pretext to realize its consistent militarist ambition by escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Historically the Japanese right-wing reactionaries had suppressed Chongryon whenever their hostile policy towards the DPRK and design to convert Japan into a military giant faced a serious crisis.
					
					 They use the suppression of Chongryon as a lever to enforce the hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Their desperate anti-Chongryon moves will only reveal Japan's true colors as a brazen-faced war criminal state and an ugly human rights abuser.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slashes "2018 Nuclear Posture Review" of U.S.
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slashes "2018 Nuclear Posture Review" of U.S.
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. released "2018 nuclear posture review", in which it officially clarified that the DPRK, together with China, Russia and Iran, constitutes a "serious threat" to the U.S. and its allies, adding that it would start modernization of strategic nuclear weapons and the development of "low-intensity smaller nuclear weapons" to cope with it.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson on Friday brands the "review" as a criminal document declaring a nuclear war against the whole world in every respect.
					
					 This is a revelation of the sinister intention of the U.S. trying to make nuclear weapons its main tool for realizing the world domination strategy, and a reckless move to turn the world into a theater of new nuclear arms race, a theater of dangerous nuclear showdown, far from leading the world to the direction of cutting down nuclear arsenals and denuclearization.
					
					 Moreover, the U.S. expansion of the right to use nukes even at the conventional attacks against it and its allies vividly shows that the reckless nuclear hysteria of Trump and his clan has gone beyond the red line.
					
					 The imprudent frenzy of the Trump clan to bring the whole mankind to a horrible nuclear catastrophe clearly proves once again that the option of the DPRK advancing under the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts was absolutely right. And it further hardens the DPRK's will to reinforce the nuclear treasured sword of justice to cope with the daily-increasing nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Mexico
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-Based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted on the Mexican website Friends of Korea on Feb. 1 ahead of his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era that has carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army, and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Figures of Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Figures of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar issued statements on Jan. 31 and Feb. 3 on the threshold of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il, the great successor to the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung, developed the Juche idea into the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He pursued his unique Songun politics. It is the exploit of significance in history of mankind that firmly guaranteed the victorious advance of the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 He paid deep attention to the development of the relations with the countries advocating independence and conducted energetic external activities to build a new world in which independence is realized.
					
					 His exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will shine forever.
					
					 Maung Maung Naying, director general of the Myit Tar Moe Publishing House of Myanmar, said:
					
					 The Korean people and the world progressives are paying the highest tribute to leader Kim Jong Il who made immortal contributions to the country's prosperity and the people's happiness and the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the defender of socialism as he proved the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and the inevitability of its victory through his rare ideo-theoretical activities and thus smashed the imperialists' moves against socialism.
					
					 It is the greatest miracle in the human history of politics that he turned the DPRK into an invincible military power and nuclear weapons state, which nobody dares provoke, holding high the banner of Songun.

articles.title: KPA's Founding Anniversary Marked
articles.content:
KPA's Founding Anniversary Marked
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo issued a bulletin on Jan. 21 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The bulletin carries an article titled "The KPA seen through history of military parades" under the headline of "Glory to the officers and men of the heroic KPA".
					
					 It said that the military parade of the regular armed forces, the first of its kind in the history of Korea, took place at the plaza before Pyongyang Railway Station on Feb. 8, 1948 and the birth of the KPA, which carried forward the traditions of the anti-Japanese guerrillas, was a historic, great event that displayed the inexhaustible strength of new Korea and its ever-victorious mettle.
					
					 The bulletin introduced the history of military parades to state that the KPA had covered the road of victory and glory under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il over the past decades since it worked an unprecedented military miracle through which it shattered the U.S. imperialists' myth of "mightiness" in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It stressed that the military parade of victory will continue in the DPRK as it has respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the peerlessly illustrious commander.

articles.title: El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio de Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio de Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 16 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan y rindio el sublime homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El Maximo Dirigente entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Fue colocado ante las estatuas un cesto de flores en nombre de Kim Jong Un.
					
					Tambien, se deposito otro a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					
					Junto con los cuadros del CC del PTC, el Comandante Supremo rindio sublime homenaje al Presidente y al Dirigente ante sus estatuas de pie.
					
					En el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente, el Maximo Dirigente le rindio sublime homenaje.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CE de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, los vicepresidentes del CC del PTC Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Thae Jong Su, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Pak Thae Song, Kim Yong Chol, Choe Hwi y Pak Thae Dok y otros cuadros del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Cuadros del gobierno visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan en el Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Cuadros del gobierno visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan en el Dia de Estrella Luz 
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del Dia de la Estrella Luz, natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los cuadros del gobierno visitaron hoy el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Entre ellos figuraban Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro de la RPDC, y otros cuadros directivos del gobierno, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales. 
					
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il estaban colocados un cesto de flores a nombre de Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, y otro a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					
					Fue depositado un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Presidium de la APS y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje a los grandes Lideres antecesores ante sus estatuas de pie y en el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a la sala de conservacion de las ordenes otorgadas al Dirigente y otras de carro, coche electrico, barco y vagon de tren usados por el hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida para las visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.
					
					Este dia, hicieron otro tanto los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los trabajadores de distintos estratos.

articles.title: Se lanzan fuegos artificiales en el Dia de la Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Se lanzan fuegos artificiales en el Dia de la Estrella Luz
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se tiraron en esta capital los fuegos artificiales para festejar el Dia de la Estrella Luz, natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El dia 16 por la noche, la Plaza Kim Il Sung en torno a la orilla del rio Taedong donde esta levantado el Monumento a la Idea Juche, la colina Mansu, el Puente Okryu y otros lugares de la capital estaban repletos de los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares esperando el momento de disparo de salvas. 
					
					    A las 19:00, mientras que se interpretaba la cancion "Dedicamos los ramos de flores", se tiraron los fuegos artificiales de diferentes colores al cielo nocturno de febrero.

articles.title: Funcionario del MINREX revela verdadero objetivo de demagogia anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Funcionario del MINREX revela verdadero objetivo de demagogia anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, EE.UU. intensifica la demagogia contra la RPDC vinculandola injustamente con el caso de muerte de Warmbier.
					Al respecto, el jefe de la oficina de informacion del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC hizo publica ayer una declaracion condenatoria que sigue:
					
					Warmbier es el criminal sentenciado el 16 de marzo de 2016 a la pena de trabajo reeducativo, en virtud de la ley de la RPDC, por haber cometido los actos hostiles cumpliendo la mision que le asigno una entidad de conspiracion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					El murio de repente a menos de una semana desde su regreso a EE.UU. con normales indices de vida. La actual administracion norteamericana debera dar la respuesta de esa incognita.
					
					Gracias a la medida humanitaria de la RPDC, el ciudadano norteamericano Hunziker, quien habia entrado ilegalmente el 24 de agosto de 1996 en nuestro pais, regreso sano y salvo el 27 de noviembre del mismo ano a su pais en compania del entonces representante Bill Richardson. Aunque el tambien murio a menos de un mes desde su regreso. EE.UU. no hizo ningun caso a su muerte ni referencia alguna.
					
					Si bien Warmbier era el criminal con antecedente hostil contra la RPDC, esta tomo la decision de devolverlo desde el punto de vista humanitario segun la sentencia del Tribunal Central fechada 13 de junio de 2017 aceptando la reiterada peticion del actual gobierno norteamericano y tomando en consideracion el mal estado de salud del retenido.
					
					A pesar de esta verdad, los compinches de Trump, acobardados ante el poderio de la RPDC situada en la posicion de Estado estrategico, se aferran a la campana demagogica anti-RPDC cuestionando de modo intencional la muerte de Warmbier. Esto parte de su siniestra artimana de manchar la imagen internacional de la RPDC, preparar el pretexto para endurecer en la palestra internacional la atmosfera de presion contra ella y justificar su intento de aplastarla con las fuerzas. 
					
					La conducta repugnante de la banda de Trump hace redoblar la decision de que son un tabu el humanitarismo y la magnanimidad para EE.UU, enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana, y hay que hacer mas rigurosa nuestra ley.
					
					EE.UU. debera portarse con prudencia al tener bien presente que pagara muy caro todas las consecuencias de su conspiracion anti-RPDC en materia de "DDHH".

articles.title: Publicado comunicado de la representacion permanente coreana ante la ONU
articles.content:
Publicado comunicado de la representacion permanente coreana ante la ONU 
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Paso un ano desde cuando la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea propuso al Secretariado de la ONU organizar el forum internacional de los juristas para averiguar la legitimidad de las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					Al respecto, la representacion permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU hizo publico el dia 12 un comunicado. 
					
					El documento recuerda la referida propuesta de la RPDC formulada en enero del ano pasado.
					
					Desde entonces, -especifica- la representacion permanente de la RPDC vino exigiendo constantemente su implementacion en las entrevistas con el secretario general y los subsecretarios generales encargados de asuntos politicos y juridicos de la ONU, las 5 cartas del representante permanente remitidas al secretario general de la ONU, los comunicados de la representacion permanente publicados en 4 ocasiones y las conferencias de prensa y entrevistas concedidas 5 veces, etc. 
					
					Sin embargo, -continua- el Secretariado de la ONU da espaldas todavia a la justa propuesta de la RPDC pretextando que segun el Articulo 39 de la Carta de la ONU, el Consejo de Seguridad puede tomar las medidas correspondientes cuando se defina como amenaza a la paz la accion de un Estado especifico.
					
					El Secretariado de la ONU debe escuchar seriamente la opinion de los juristas de muchos paises del mundo que apoyan la propuesta de la RPDC insistiendo en que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no tiene la razon juridica ni justificacion moral para cuestionar como violacion de la ley internacional la prueba nuclear o el lanzamiento de cohete balistico y satelite artificial, enfatiza.
					
					La representacion permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU demanda una vez mas que el Secretariado de la ONU acepte lo mas pronto posible la propuesta coreana, de acuerdo con su mision estipulada por la Carta de la ONU, concluye.
